actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to repeal the prohibition against the extension of export credit for nuclear materials or technology transfer. Repeals prohibitions against credit approval to a country for the purchase of any liquid metal fast breeder reactor or any nuclear fuel processing facility. Prohibits the Bank from approving credit for the export of nuclear materials or technology transfer, unless the President determines that such credit approval is in the national interest and reports this determination to Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945.
